basic.description:
Examination of relationship between sociological theory and methods of social research; topics include logic of research, hypothesis formulation, and variables and their operationalization.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Social Research Methods

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE  A grade of C- in SOCY122/6.0.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from GPHY240/3.0; SOCY210/3.0.
